wikipedia_page.main: Sir Robert Ponsonby Staples, 12th Baronet (1853–1943) was an artist, also remembered for his eccentricity.

response: Her father was Sir Robert Staples, 13th Baronet of Lissan and Faughanvale. Her grandfather was Sir Robert Staples, 12th Baronet, who was a well-known painter.
**Sir Robert Staples, 12th Baronet (1853-1943), Northern Irish artist
